official_title: Honoring the life of Dr. Ronald W. Walters and commending his life as an example to future generations of the people of the United States.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Expresses condolences to the family of Dr. Ronald W. Walters (professor, civil rights scholar, and activist) and honors his lifelong dedication to freedom and democracy.

titles.title: Honoring the life of Dr. Ronald W. Walters and commending his life as an example to future generations of the people of the United States.
